title: 17-year-old shot, killed inside house
content:
Please install the latest Adobe Flash Player Plugin to watch this content.
ATLANTA - Atlanta police are working to determine what led to the shooting death of a 17-year-old boy.
The shooting happened at a house on Charleston Avenue in southeast Atlanta around 10:30 p.m. Sunday.
Officers told Channel 2 Action News they are investigating whether it was an accidental shooting.
Investigators questioned other people inside the house.
